```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    echo = FALSE,
    warning = FALSE,
    message = FALSE,
    results = "asis",
    comment = ""
)
# library(cv)
library(here)
devtools::load_all()
library(tidyverse)
library(RefManageR)
RefManageR::BibOptions(
    bib.style = "authoryear",
    first.inits = TRUE,
    style = "markdown",
    max.names = Inf,
    sorting = "ydnt"
    # no.print.fields = NULL
)
cv_data <- read_cv_items() %>% 
    filter(year(start) >= 2018)
bib_items <- read_bib_items() %>% 
    filter(year >= 2018)
rpkgs <- cv::rpackages
```
